price: 5. Truly, nothing is hidden from Allâh, in the earth or in the heaven.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَخۡفَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ شَيۡءٞ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha lā yakhfā ʿalayhi shayon fī al-arḍi walā fī al-samāi
